Name: Zoom In & Out Devtools
Description: Can I zoom in and out of the devtools panel?
Author: @pankajparashar

Chrome.Notes:
1. In **Developer Tools** > Open **Command Menu** (`Cmd+Shift+P` or `Ctrl+Shift+P`) and Run > "Zoom in" or `Cmd+` or `Ctrl+` to increase the zoom level.
2. Run > "Zoom out" or `Cmd-` or `Ctrl-` to decrease the zoom level.
3. Run > "Reset zoom level" or `Cmd+0` or `Ctrl+0` to reset the zoom level.
Chrome.Name: Zoom In & Out Devtools

Firefox.Notes: 1. In **Web Developer Tools** > Use `Cmd+` or `Ctrl+` to increase the zoom level. Use `Cmd-` or `Ctrl-` to decrease the zoom level. To reset the zoom level, press `Ctrl+0` or `Cmd+0`.

Safari.Notes:

2. (Or) **Settings** (`Cmd,`) > General > Zoom.
